name: Gunner Strike 3d: hardcore battlefield shooter
description:
Gunner Strike 3d is about hardcore real shooting in the field of battle with amazing an thrilling action. You have to shoot shoot and shoot until all of your enemies are died.

For This you are also assigned with best machine guns and modern weapons. Equip yourself with best sniper shooting , bazooka shooting and heavy weapons and destroy that ever comes in the way of success.

Gunner shooter you are allowed to strike as hard as you can. and wipe out everything comes to attack on you. its about most brutal war with no mercy so shooting is best source of survival.
